entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
